name: The Conjurer's Quest: A Ghouls! Tale

metadata.name: The Conjurer's Departure
metadata.description:
The Ghoul Hunter Association has called upon its last resort, The Conjurer. The dormant hero awakes, equips himself with his bedside Basic Ghouls Catcher Net, takes control of a nearby Gabba Ghoul and rides off on his quest. 

But first he must equip himself, for the journey ahead will not be short, or easy.
